name: expo
title: Expo
description: Manage your expo.dev Projects, Apple Devices and Environment Variables
author: patrick-web

commands.name: apple-devices
commands.title: Apple Devices
commands.subtitle: Manage EAS apple devices
commands.description: View, Create and Edit apple devices

commands.name: manage-envs
commands.title: Environment Variables
commands.subtitle: Manage project environment variables
commands.description: View, Create, Edit and Delete environment variables

commands.name: push-notification
commands.title: Push Notification
commands.subtitle: Test Expo push notifications
commands.description: Send customized push notifications to your Expo application users

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
